name: VK Plus
description:
A complete, compact and customizable theme for VKontakte.
Before installing, choose the background, page color, images format, among other options, by clicking the "Customize Settings" button.
After installing, reload the VK page.

user.name: João.
user.about: Welcome to my page. See my user styles and enjoy them.

style_setting_options.label: Default
Light blue
Gray
White

Dark blue

White (default)
Light gray
Gray
Scrollable (default)
style_setting_options.value: .body_im .side_bar {position: fixed !important; z-index: 0 !important}

style_setting_options.label: Fixed (no ads)
style_setting_options.value:
.side_bar {position: fixed !important; top: 0 !important; z-index: 0 !important}
#ads_left {display: none !important}

style_setting_options.label: Fixed (default)
Scrollable
Square
Scrollable
style_setting_options.value: #bt_reply_form.reply_box_inner_wrap.fixed:not(.reply_box_open) {position: relative !important}

style_setting_options.label: Visible and small
style_setting_options.value:
#stl_left, #layer_stl {visibility: hidden !important}
#stl_left #stl_bg, #layer_stl #layer_stl_text, #layer_stl #layer_stl_bg {visibility: visible !important}

style_setting_options.label: Hidden
style_setting_options.value:
#stl_left, #layer_stl {visibility: hidden !important}
#stl_left #stl_text, #layer_stl #layer_stl_text {visibility: visible !important}

style_setting_options.label: Hidden
style_setting_options.value:
#side_bar .left_menu_nav_wrap, .blog_right_menu_nav .left_menu_nav_wrap {display: none !important}
.ads_ad_box_border.repeat_ver {border-bottom: none !important}

style_setting_options.label: Visible
On the right
style_setting_options.value: body:not(.is_rtl1) .blst_row .blst_fixed, body:not(.is_rtl1) .blst_row .blst_closed {float: right !important; transform: translateY(1px) !important}

style_setting_options.label: No ads
style_setting_options.value: .wall_module .feed_row > .post._ads_block_data_w, .wall_module .feed_row > [id^="postadsite"]._ads_block_data_w, #ads_left {display: none !important}
